video.title: Hunter X Hunter (2011)
video.synopsis: To fulfill his dreams of becoming a legendary Hunter like his dad, a young boy must pass a rigorous examination and find his missing father.

episodes.synopsis: To take the Hunter Exam and follow in his father's footsteps, 12-year-old Gon must first fulfill a promise to Mito-san, the woman who raised him.
episodes.title: Departure x and x Friends

episodes.synopsis: While taking a shortcut to the exam site, Gon, Leorio and Kurapika encounter some old ladies who won't let them pass till they answer a quiz question.
episodes.title: Test x of x Tests

episodes.synopsis: Gon, Kurapika and Leorio reach the exam site, where many other applicants have already arrived -- including a talkative ninja named Hanzo.
episodes.title: Rivals x for x Survival

episodes.synopsis: Leorio and Kurapika run together in the exam's first phase. After going 80 kilometers, they reach a flight of stairs, where Satotz steps up the pace.
episodes.title: Hope x and x Ambition

episodes.synopsis: After making it through the long underground tunnel, the applicants find themselves in a foggy wetland, where they're attacked by monsters.
episodes.title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky

episodes.synopsis: After a dustup with Hisoka, Gon and his friends make it safely to the site for the second phase of the exam, which will test their cooking abilities.
episodes.title: A x Surprising x Challenge

episodes.synopsis: Aboard an airship taking them to the exam's third phase, Gon and Killua are invited to particpate in a simple game that could turn them into Hunters.
episodes.title: Showdown x on x the Airship

episodes.synopsis: The airship arrives at the site for the exam's third phase, the top of Trick Tower, where applicants must reach the bottom within 72 hours to pass.
episodes.title: Solution x Is x Majority Rules?

episodes.synopsis: Gon and his friends must win three of the next four rounds -- which include a death match between Kurapika and serial killer Majitani.
episodes.title: Beware x of x Prisoners

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Kurapika win their matches, giving the group a 2-1 lead. But the opponents claim Majitani is only unconscious, so Kurapika's match isn't over.
episodes.title: Trick x to x the Trick

episodes.synopsis: After falling for his gambling opponent's mind games, Leorio loses and puts the group in a tight spot -- with their fate resting on Killua.
episodes.title: Trouble x with x the Gamble

episodes.synopsis: The group members take varied approaches to their 50-hour penalty. Once they're allowed to return to the test, they must overcome many more hurdles.
episodes.title: Last Test x of x Resolve

episodes.synopsis: Gon writes a letter to Mito-san and Grandma detailing his journey, from the day of his departure to the latest challenge at Trick Tower.
episodes.title: Letter x from x Gon

episodes.synopsis: For the fourth phase of the exam, the applicants head to Zevil Island, where each candidate must collect 6 points to pass.
episodes.title: Hit x the x Target

episodes.synopsis: Gon waits for the perfect time to use his skill with a fishing rod to snatch Hisoka's tag. Later, Kurapika and Leorio form an alliance.
episodes.title: Scramble x of x Deception

episodes.synopsis: Hisoka is stalking Kurapika and Leorio. After they negotiate their way out of a fight, Hisoka goes in search of a new target.
episodes.title: Defeat x and x Disgrace

episodes.synopsis: Tired of being shadowed by Imori, Killua challenges him to a fight. Meanwhile, Gon, Leorio and Kurapika formulate a plan for taking Ponzu's tag.
episodes.title: Trap x in x the Hole

episodes.synopsis: When Gon and his friends are trapped inside a cave by poisonous snakes, Leorio is bitten -- and growing weak.
episodes.title: Big x Time x Interview

episodes.synopsis: In the final phase of the Hunter Exam, the first match is Hanzo vs. Gon, who can't do anything against his opponent -- but refuses to give up.
episodes.title: Can't Win x But x Can't Lose

episodes.synopsis: After breaking his arm in the fight against Hanzo, Gon wakes up in bed and is congratulated by Satotz for passing the Hunter Exam.
episodes.title: Baffling Turn x of x Events

episodes.synopsis: Dismayed that Killua was forced to kill, Gon proclaims that he'll go to Kukuroo Mountain to rescue Killua.
episodes.title: Some x Brother x Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Upon arriving in the Republic of Podokea, Gon, Leorio and Kurapika head to Kukuroo Mountain where Killua lives. But they're blocked by a massive gate.
episodes.title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog

episodes.synopsis: Gon and his friends decide to pass through the Trial Gate to see Killua, but they require strength training in order to open it.
episodes.title: The x Guard's x Duty

episodes.synopsis: With help from Canary, who's concerned about Killua, Gon and his friends get closer to the mansion -- where Killua is in solitary confinement.
episodes.title: The x Zoldyck x Family

episodes.synopsis: At the butler's office, Gon and his friends meet Goto, who challenges them to a game to determine whether they're worthy of being Killua's friends.
episodes.title: Can't See x if x You're Blind

episodes.synopsis: On Whale Island, a letter from Gon arrives for Mito.
episodes.title: Then x and x After

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua arrive at Heavens Arena, where they meet a teen with astonishing strength who uses a strange technique reminiscent of Illumi's.
episodes.title: Arrival x at x the Arena

episodes.synopsis: As Wing explains the four key principles of Nen to the boys, Killua believes they aren't being told the whole story.
episodes.title: Nen x and x Nen

episodes.synopsis: After reaching the 200th floor, Gon and Killua run into Hisoka's barrier of Nen and decide to ask Wing for help.
episodes.title: Awakening x and x Potential

episodes.synopsis: Facing Gido in a Heavens Arena match, Gon uses Ten to protect himself but soon finds himself defending against Gido's Dancing Tops technique.
episodes.title: Fierce x and x Ferocious

episodes.synopsis: A month has passed since Gon was seriously injured, and a confident Kastro is about to fight the unflappable Hisoka in Heavens Arena.
episodes.title: Destiny x and x Tenacity

episodes.synopsis: Kastro and Hisoka square off in Heaven's Arena, where Kastro seems to have the advantage after creating a clone of himself and severing Hisoka's arm.
episodes.title: A x Surprising x Win

episodes.synopsis: After a two-month break, Gon and Killua are allowed to practice Nen again -- prompting Gido, Sadaso and Riehlvelt to press for a fight in the arena.
episodes.title: An x Empty x Threat

episodes.synopsis: In a fight against Gido, Gon withstands his attacks and overwhelms him, which impresses Hisoka.
episodes.title: Power x to x Avenge

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua begin training in Hatsu. Later, Gon challenges Hisoka to return the favor from the Hunter Exam.
episodes.title: The x True x Pass

episodes.synopsis: After punching Hisoka in the face, Gon returns the tag from the Hunter Exam. Hisoka is ecstatic to see Gon's development.
episodes.title: A Big Debt x and x a Small Kick

episodes.synopsis: After learning Nen and becoming a true Hunter, Gon returns to Whale Island, where Mito gives him a box from his father.
episodes.title: Ging x and x Gon

episodes.synopsis: Gon hears a recording of his father's voice on a cassette tape. But when the tape is stopped, the message is erased.
episodes.title: Reply x from x Dad

episodes.synopsis: The Phantom Troupe is Kurapika's most hated enemy. Five years ago, they took his relatives and friends, along with their scarlet eyes.
episodes.title: Wish x and x Promise

episodes.synopsis: Kurapika and the other job seekers arrive at the home of a human trophy collector and are attacked by an unknown force.
episodes.title: Nen x Users x Unite?

episodes.synopsis: The biggest auction in the world is about to take place in Yorknew City. The Phantom Troupe leader has instructed the members to gather in the city.
episodes.title: Gathering x of x Heroes

episodes.synopsis: The auction is finally about to begin. Gon, Killua and Leorio are working hard to amass enough money to buy Greed Island.
episodes.title: Defend x and x Attack

episodes.synopsis: The Phantom Troupe attacks the underground auction held by the Mafia. Afterward, there is no sign of the merchandise or guests.
episodes.title: A x Shocking x Tragedy

episodes.synopsis: After Uvogin slaughters the Mafia's pursuit, the Mafia dispatches their secret weapon, the Shadow Beasts.
episodes.title: Buildup x to a x Fierce Battle

episodes.synopsis: Kurapika is able to capture Uvogin, a member of the Phantom Troupe. Kurapika struggles to control his rage as Uvogin makes demands.
episodes.title: Restraint x and x Vow

episodes.synopsis: Uvogin was able to escape. However, after the blow to his pride, he is determined to track down Kurapika and defeat him.
episodes.title: Chasing x and x Waiting

episodes.synopsis: Kurapika finds himself face-to-face with Uvogin, a member of the Phantom Troupe that destroyed his Kurta clan.
episodes.title: Condition x and x Condition

episodes.synopsis: Gon, Killua and Leorio are trying to get their hands on enough money to buy Greed Island.
episodes.title: Very x Sharp x Eye

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua have been captured by the Phantom Troupe. They are questioned about the chain user that the Troupe is searching for.
episodes.title: Pursuit x and x Analysis

episodes.synopsis: Gon and his friends are hoping to win the reward that's been placed on the Phantom Troupe.
episodes.title: Ally x and x Sword

episodes.synopsis: The auction has been rescheduled, and the Mafia expects the Phantom Troupe to attack again.
episodes.title: A x Brutal x Battlefield

episodes.synopsis: The Troupe is attacking the auction with all their power. The Ten Dons' hired assassins are no match, except for Zeno and Silva.
episodes.title: Assault x and x Impact

episodes.synopsis: The leader of the Phantom Troupe is dead, and Kurapika is shocked by the news. Unconvinced, he tries to get a glimpse of the body.
episodes.title: Fake x and x Psyche

episodes.synopsis: Gon, Killua, Kurapika and Leorio are finally reunited. Kurapika reveals his Nen powers to the others.
episodes.title: Fortunes x Aren't x Right?

episodes.synopsis: After Chrollo tells fortunes for all of the Troupe members, they suspect that Hisoka has betrayed them.
episodes.title: Alies x and x Lies

episodes.synopsis: Chrollo uses the information he has on Neon to identify the location of the chain user, Kurapika.
episodes.title: Beloved x and x Beleaguered

episodes.synopsis: The Phantom Troupe has learned that Kurapika was the one who killed Uvogin. Chrollo takes Gon and Killua to the hotel lobby.
episodes.title: Initiative x and x Law

episodes.synopsis: Kurapika has captured Chrollo. He offers to release Chrollo if Pakunoda brings Gon and Killua to him.
episodes.title: Signal x to x Retreat

episodes.synopsis: The game Greed Island, which holds a clue to finding Ging, is finally at auction. Gon and Killua ask the winning buyer to hire them as players.
episodes.title: Bid x and x Haste

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua are trying to get themselves chosen as Greed Island players. Only 32 of the 200 applicants will pass. Can Gon and Killua make it?
episodes.title: End x and x Beginning

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua have finally made it inside the world of Greed Island. However, all they find is a message from Ging telling Gon to enjoy the game.
episodes.title: Invitation x and x Friend

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua set off for Masadora in search of spell cards. On the way, they run into many different monsters.
episodes.title: Reality? x and x Raw

episodes.synopsis: Bisky is looking to train Gon and Killua. Their first test is to defeat the bounty hunter Binolt within two weeks.
episodes.title: A x Hard x Master?

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua are gradually improving their Nen under Bisky's tutelage. They are now able to capture the monsters they previously struggled against.
episodes.title: Strengthen x and x Threaten

episodes.synopsis: After hearing Bisky's lecture on rock-paper-scissors, Gon decides to work on a special technique using Enhancer, Emitter and Conjurer abilities.
episodes.title: Evil Fist x and x Rock-Paper-Scissors

episodes.synopsis: Now that Gon, Killua and Bisky are together again, they begin working on beating the game by collecting cards.
episodes.title: Strategy x and x Scheme

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua receive an invitation from other players to team up to prevent Genthru from beating the game.
episodes.title: 15 x 15

episodes.synopsis: The condition for obtaining Patch of Shore is to chase a band of 15 pirates out of town. Gon and crew are immediately taken to the boss, Razor.
episodes.title: Pirates x and x Guesses

episodes.synopsis: Gon and his friends have teamed up with Hisoka and Goreinu to challenge Razor again. To round out the party, they recruit Team Tsezgerra.
episodes.title: A x Heated x Showdown

episodes.synopsis: Gon is unable to hold onto Razor's throw and is sent to the outfield. He uses Back to return, but Hisoka is also injured.
episodes.title: Guts x and x Courage

episodes.synopsis: Gon, Killua and Hisoka team up to catch Razor's strongest throw. Once the ball has been secured, Gon uses all of his strength to launch it at Razor.
episodes.title: Bargain x and x Deal

episodes.synopsis: In order to beat the game, the other players must face off against Genthru. Tsezgerra offers to distract Genthru for three weeks.
episodes.title: Chase x and x Chance

episodes.synopsis: Tsezgerra's team has not returned to the game. Genthru finally turns his attention to Gon's group.
episodes.title: Insanity x and x Sanity

episodes.synopsis: Genthru has shown that he is much stronger than Gon. However, after Gon refuses to back down, he finally uses Little Flower to severely injure Gon.
episodes.title: Victor x and x Loser

episodes.synopsis: After defeating Genthru and collecting 99 restricted cards, Gon and his friends participate in the final event, a quiz tournament open to all players.
episodes.title: Ging's Friends x and x True Friends

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua use the cards they brought back from the game to warp to Nigg, who they believe is Ging. However, they are sent to a different man.
episodes.title: Reunion x and x Understanding

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua join Kite's team to investigate the Chimera Ants, dangerous insects that can pass traits from the prey they consume to their offspring.
episodes.title: Unease x and x Sighting

episodes.synopsis: Kite uses the location where the Chimera Ant arm was discovered and ocean patterns to determine the location of the actual Chimera Ant.
episodes.title: Very x Rapid x Reproduction

episodes.synopsis: After passing a strict checkpoint, Gon and his new friends enter NGL where they suspect the Chimera Ant is. However, ten other teams already arrived.
episodes.title: No x Good x NGL

episodes.synopsis: Pokkle and Ponzu use Ponzu's bees to deliver messages asking the Hunter Association to help eliminate the Chimera Ants.
episodes.title: Evil x and x Terrible

episodes.synopsis: Gon, Killua and Kite discover the remains of a destroyed village. There, they encounter their first Chimera Ant.
episodes.title: The x Fight x Begins

episodes.synopsis: Some of the more aggressive Chimera Ants have eaten the villains who ran the NGL underground, and have grown increasingly evil.
episodes.title: Kite x and x Slots

episodes.synopsis: The Hunter Association has dispatched a force to exterminate the Chimera Ants. Meanwhile, Gon and his friends are being targeted by Chimera Ants.
episodes.title: Inspiration x to x Evolve

episodes.synopsis: Hagya sends his soldiers after Gon, Killua and Kite in an attempt to capture rare humans. Gon and his friends struggle as Chimera Ants attack.
episodes.title: A x Fated x Awakening

episodes.synopsis: Kite, Gon and Killua follow Hagya as they seek the Chimera Ant nest where the Queen awaits.
episodes.title: Light x and x Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Kite used himself as a decoy to allow Gon and Killua to escape. The two boys vow to save Kite, believing that he lives.
episodes.title: Promise x and x Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua are training to take the tokens from their targets. Immediately after finishing their training, they're sent by Bisky to fight Knuckle.
episodes.title: Duel x and x Escape

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua head back to their lodging, exhausted after battling Knuckle. That is when their second opponent, Shoot, attempts to finish them off.
episodes.title: Rock-Paper-Scissors x and x Weakness

episodes.synopsis: Gon has finally forced Knuckle to use his full strength. However, Knuckle immediately identifies the weakness in Jajanken, Gon's special attack.
episodes.title: Compassion x and x Strength

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua are finally facing off against Knuckle and Shoot. Killua takes Shoot while Gon's opponent is Knuckle.
episodes.title: Interest x and x Curse

episodes.synopsis: At long last, the Queen gives birth to the King. The Chimera Ants are cowed by the menancing aura emitted by the King.
episodes.title: The Strong x and x the Weak

episodes.synopsis: After surrendering, Colt requests that the Hunters save the dying Queen. Morel immediately dispatches a team of researchers to the castle.
episodes.title: One Wish x and x Two Promises

episodes.synopsis: The King is on the move. After invading the Republic of East Gorteau and eating a Nen user's aura, his own power grows.
episodes.title: Date x with x Palm

episodes.synopsis: While Gon is on a date with Palm, Killua encounters Rammot in the forest. Killua does not want to let Gon -- who can't use Nen -- get in a fight.
episodes.title: Friend x and x Journey

episodes.synopsis: The difference in physical strength between Chimera Ants and humans is immense, as the two Hunters appear to be overwhelmed by Cheetu's speed.
episodes.title: Grudge x and x Dread

episodes.synopsis: Kalluto, Feitan, Shalnark, Phinks, Shizuku and Bonolenov arrive at Meteor City after hearing that Chimera Ants have taken over.
episodes.title: A x Lawless x Home

episodes.synopsis: Zazan has built a new Chimera Ant nest in Meteor City, home of the Phantom Troupe. The Phantom Troupe members head inside the nest to defeat Zazan.
episodes.title: Carnage x and x Devastation

episodes.synopsis: Gon and Killua infiltrate the Republic of East Gorteau in an attempt to stop the selection process that is occurring, only to find it deserted.
episodes.title: Infiltration x and x Selection

episodes.synopsis: Killua and Gon split up to stop the selection process, but Gon finds his path blocked by two new Chimera ants, an owl and a bat.
episodes.title: Combination x and x Evolution

episodes.synopsis: Knuckle and Shoot attempt to ambush Cheetu, but at the last moment, Cheetu changes directions and vanishes.
episodes.title: Tracking x and x Pursuit
